foreignNames.flavor: "Não me considero um herói. Sei apenas o que os Vec ensinam: a justiça deve ser sempre feita e a corrupção deve ser sempre combatida."

foreignNames.name: Паладин эн-Век
foreignNames.text: Первый удар, Защита от черного, Защита от красного (Это существо наносит боевые повреждения раньше существ без Первого удара. Ни один черный или красный объект не может блокировать это существо, делать его своей целью, наносить ему повреждения и зачаровывать его.)
foreignNames.flavor: "Я не считаю себя героем. Я знаю только то, чему учат у Веков: всегда стоять на страже правосудия и всегда противостоять коррупции".

foreignNames.name: 维克族神圣武士
foreignNames.text: 先攻，反黑保护，反红保护（此生物会比不具先攻异能的生物提前造成战斗伤害。 它不能被任何黑色或红色的东西所阻挡，指定为目标，造成伤害，或是被结附。）
foreignNames.flavor: 「我不把自己当英雄。 我只奉行维克族的教诲：必得效命正义，铲除腐败。」

cards.originalText: First strike, protection from black, protection from red

cards.name: Paladin en-Vec
cards.text: First strike, protection from black and from red (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike. It can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, or enchanted by anything black or red.)
cards.flavor: "I do not consider myself a hero. I know only what the Vec teach: justice must always be served and corruption must always be opposed."

cards.name: Pariah
cards.text:
Enchant creature
All damage that would be dealt to you is dealt to enchanted creature instead.

rulings.text: You can attach this to an opponent’s creature, and all damage done to you is instead done to their creature.

All damage being dealt to you at one time gets redirected to one Pariah. If you take 3 damage at once, all 3 damage goes to one Pariah. If you take damage from multiple creatures in combat, all the combat damage goes to one Pariah.

foreignNames.name: Paria
foreignNames.text:
Kreaturenverzauberung (Bestimme eine Kreatur als Ziel, sowie du diese Karte spielst. Diese Karte kommt an die Kreatur angelegt ins Spiel.)
Aller Schaden, der dir zugefügt würde, wird stattdessen der verzauberten Kreatur zugefügt.
foreignNames.flavor: „Warum sollte ich Buße für meine Taten tun, wenn ich so viele Untertanen habe, die es freiwillig für mich machen?" —Fürst Konda

foreignNames.name: Paria
foreignNames.text:
Encantar criatura. (Haz objetivo a una criatura al jugarlo. Esta carta entra en juego anexada a esa criatura.)
Todo el daño que se te fuera a hacer, en vez de eso, se le hace a la criatura encantada.
foreignNames.flavor: "¿Por qué habría de considerar una penitencia por mis acciones cuando tengo tantos súbditos dispuestos a hacerlo por mi?" —Señor Konda

foreignNames.name: Paria
foreignNames.text:
Enchanter : créature (Ciblez une créature au moment où vous jouez cette carte. Cette carte arrive en jeu attachée à cette créature.)
Toutes les blessures qui devraient vous être infligées sont infligées à la créature enchantée à la place.
foreignNames.flavor: « Pourquoi serais-je puni pour mes actes alors que tant de mes sujets sont prêts souffrir à ma place ? » —Seigneur Konda

foreignNames.name: Pariah
foreignNames.text:
Incanta creatura (Bersaglia una creatura mentre giochi questa carta. Questa carta entra in gioco assegnata a quella creatura.)
Tutto il danno che ti verrebbe inflitto viene invece inflitto alla creatura incantata.
foreignNames.flavor: "Perché dovrei prendere in considerazione una punizione per le mie azioni quando ho così tanti sudditi desiderosi di farlo al posto mio?" —Lord Konda

foreignNames.name: 最下層民
foreignNames.text:
エンチャント（クリーチャー） （これをプレイする際に、クリーチャー１体を対象とする。 このカードはそのクリーチャーにつけられている状態で場に出る。）
あなたに与えられるすべてのダメージは、代わりにエンチャントされているクリーチャーに与えられる。
foreignNames.flavor: 我が行いを我が悔いることなどあろうか。これほど多くの者が、我の代わりにならんと望んでおるのに。 ――君主今田

foreignNames.name: Pária
foreignNames.text:
Encantar criatura (Ao jogar este card, escolha uma criatura alvo. Este card entra em jogo anexado àquela criatura.)
Todo o dano que seria causado a você, em vez disso, é causado à criatura encantada.
foreignNames.flavor: "Por que devo considerar uma punição para as minhas ações quando tenho tantos indivíduos desejosos de fazê-lo por mim?" — Senhor Konda

foreignNames.name: Пария
foreignNames.text:
Зачаровать существо (При разыгрывании этой карты выберите целью существо. Эта карта входит в игру прикрепленной к тому существу.)
Все повреждения, которые будут нанесены вам, наносятся зачарованному существу вместо этого.
foreignNames.flavor: "Почему я должен нести наказание за мои действия, когда у меня так много подданных, с радостью сделающих это за меня?" — Лорд Конда

foreignNames.name: 贱民
foreignNames.text:
生物结界（于使用时指定一个生物为目标。 此牌进场时结附在该生物上。）
所有将对你造成的伤害改为对受此结界的生物造成之。
foreignNames.flavor: 「我虽造了业，但既然有那么多人愿替我承担，又何必一肩揽下？」 ～今田城主

cards.originalText:
Enchant creature
All damage that would be dealt to you is dealt to enchanted creature instead.

cards.name: Pariah
cards.text:
Enchant creature
All damage that would be dealt to you is dealt to enchanted creature instead.
cards.flavor:
"Why would I consider penance for my actions when I have so many subjects willing to do it for me?"
—Lord Konda

rulings.text: You can attach this to an opponent’s creature, and all damage done to you is instead done to their creature.

All damage being dealt to you at one time gets redirected to one Pariah. If you take 3 damage at once, all 3 damage goes to one Pariah. If you take damage from multiple creatures in combat, all the combat damage goes to one Pariah.

cards.name: Peek
cards.text:
Look at target player's hand.
Draw a card.
cards.flavor: Sometimes you have to read between the minds.

foreignNames.name: Spicken
foreignNames.text: Schaue dir die Karten auf der Hand eines Spielers deiner Wahl an.Ziehe eine Karte.
foreignNames.flavor: Manchmal muss man sogar um vier Ecken denken.

foreignNames.name: Atisbar
foreignNames.text:
Mira la mano del jugador objetivo.
Roba una carta.
foreignNames.flavor: A veces tienes que leer entre mentes.

foreignNames.name: Regard furtif
foreignNames.text:
Regardez la main du joueur ciblé.
Piochez une carte.
foreignNames.flavor: Il faut parfois savoir lire entre les esprits.

foreignNames.name: Sbirciare
foreignNames.text:
Guarda la mano di un giocatore bersaglio.
Pesca una carta.
foreignNames.flavor: A volte devi leggere tra le menti.

foreignNames.name: のぞき見
foreignNames.text:
プレイヤー１人を対象とし、そのプレイヤーの手札を見る。
カードを１枚引く。
foreignNames.flavor: 心と心の間を読まなければならないこともあるんだ。

foreignNames.name: Espiar
foreignNames.text:
Olhe a mão do jogador alvo.
Compre um card.
foreignNames.flavor: Algumas vezes é preciso ler nas entrelinhas das mentes.

foreignNames.name: Взгляд Украдкой
foreignNames.text:
Посмотрите в руку целевого игрока.
Возьмите карту.
foreignNames.flavor: Иногда приходится читать меж мыслей.

foreignNames.name: 偷窥
foreignNames.text:
检视目标牌手的手牌。
抓一张牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 有时你必须寻找心外之意。

cards.originalText:
Look at target player's hand.
Draw a card.

cards.name: Persuasion
cards.text:
Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.)
You control enchanted creature.
cards.flavor: There's no telling what an accomplished mage might collect.

foreignNames.name: Überreden
foreignNames.text: Kreaturenverzauberung (Bestimme eine Kreatur als Ziel, sowie du diese Karte spielst. Diese Karte kommt an die Kreatur angelegt ins Spiel.)Du kontrollierst die verzauberte Kreatur.
foreignNames.flavor: Man kann nie sagen, was ein erfahrener Magier alles so aufsammelt.

foreignNames.name: Persuasión
foreignNames.text:
Encantar criatura. (Haz objetivo a una criatura al jugarlo. Esta carta entra en juego anexada a esa criatura.)
Tú controlas la criatura encantada.
foreignNames.flavor: No hay manera de decir qué puede coleccionar un mago consumado.

foreignNames.name: Persuasion
foreignNames.text:
Enchanter : créature (Ciblez une créature au moment où vous jouez cette carte. Cette carte arrive en jeu attachée à cette créature.)
Vous contrôlez la créature enchantée.
foreignNames.flavor: Il est impossible de prévoir ce qu'un magicien accompli va collectionner.

foreignNames.name: Persuasione
foreignNames.text:
Incanta creatura (Bersaglia una creatura mentre giochi questa carta. Questa carta entra in gioco assegnata a quella creatura.)
Controlli la creatura incantata.
foreignNames.flavor: Non c'è modo di prevedere cosa un mago esperto possa collezionare.

foreignNames.name: 説得
foreignNames.text:
エンチャント（クリーチャー） （これをプレイする際に、クリーチャー１体を対象とする。 このカードはそのクリーチャーにつけられている状態で場に出る。）
あなたはエンチャントされているクリーチャーのコントロールを得る。
foreignNames.flavor: 熟達の魔道士が何を集めるのか、明らかにはなっていない。

foreignNames.name: Persuasão
foreignNames.text:
Encantar criatura (Ao jogar este card, escolha uma criatura alvo. Este card entra em jogo anexado àquela criatura.)
Você controla a criatura encantada.
foreignNames.flavor: Não há limites para o que um mago habilidoso pode coletar.

foreignNames.name: Убеждение
foreignNames.text:
Зачаровать существо (При разыгрывании этой карты выберите целью существо. Эта карта входит в игру прикрепленной к тому существу.)
Вы контролируете зачарованное существо.
foreignNames.flavor: Трудно сказать, какую плату может запросить опытный маг.

foreignNames.name: 劝服
foreignNames.text:
生物结界（于使用时指定一个生物为目标。 此牌进场时结附在该生物上。）
你操控受此结界的生物。
foreignNames.flavor: 熟练的法师想收些什么，没人能说得准。

cards.originalText:
Enchant creature
You control enchanted creature.

cards.name: Persuasion
cards.text:
Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.)
You control enchanted creature.
cards.flavor: There's no telling what an accomplished mage might collect.

cards.name: Phage the Untouchable
cards.text:
When Phage the Untouchable enters the battlefield, if you didn't cast it from your hand, you lose the game.
Whenever Phage deals combat damage to a creature, destroy that creature. It can't be regenerated.
Whenever Phage deals combat damage to a player, that player loses the game.

rulings.text: It is only considered “cast from your hand” if you cast it as a spell from your hand. Putting it onto the battlefield from your hand using a spell or ability will cause you to lose the game.
In a Commander game where this card is your commander, casting it from the Command zone does not count as casting it from your hand.

foreignNames.name: Phage die Unberührbare
foreignNames.text:
Falls du Phage die Unberührbare nicht aus deiner Hand gespielt hast, wenn sie ins Spiel kommt, verlierst du das Spiel.
Immer wenn Phage einer Kreatur Kampfschaden zufügt, zerstöre diese Kreatur. Sie kann nicht regeneriert werden.
Immer wenn Phage einem Spieler Kampfschaden zufügt, verliert dieser Spieler das Spiel.

foreignNames.name: Phage la Intocable
foreignNames.text:
Cuando Phage la Intocable entre en juego, si no la jugaste de tu mano, pierdes el juego.
Siempre que Phage haga daño de combate a una criatura, destruye esa criatura. No puede ser regenerada.
Siempre que Phage haga daño de combate a un jugador, ese jugador pierde el juego.

foreignNames.name: Phage l'Intouchable
foreignNames.text:
Quand Phage l'Intouchable arrive en jeu, si vous ne l'avez pas jouée depuis votre main, vous perdez la partie.
À chaque fois que Phage l'Intouchable inflige des blessures de combat à une créature, détruisez cette créature. Elle ne peut pas être régénérée.
À chaque fois que Phage l'Intouchable inflige des blessures de combat à un joueur, ce joueur perd la partie.

foreignNames.name: Phage l'Intoccabile
foreignNames.text:
Quando Phage l'Intoccabile entra in gioco, se non l'hai giocata dalla tua mano, perdi la partita.
Ogniqualvolta Phage infligge danno da combattimento a una creatura, distruggi quella creatura. Non può essere rigenerata.
Ogniqualvolta Phage infligge danno da combattimento a un giocatore, quel giocatore perde la partita.

foreignNames.name: 触れられざる者フェイジ
foreignNames.text:
触れられざる者フェイジが場に出たとき、あなたがそれをあなたの手札からプレイしていなかった場合、あなたはこのゲームに敗北する。
触れられざる者フェイジがいずれかのクリーチャーに戦闘ダメージを与えるたび、そのクリーチャーを破壊する。 それは再生できない。
触れられざる者フェイジがいずれかのプレイヤーに戦闘ダメージを与えるたび、そのプレイヤーはこのゲームに敗北する。

foreignNames.name: Phage, a Intocável
foreignNames.text:
Quando Phage, a Intocável, entra em jogo, se você não a tiver jogado de sua mão, você perde o jogo.
Toda vez que Phage causar dano de combate a uma criatura, destrua aquela criatura. Ela não pode ser regenerada.
Toda vez que Phage causa dano de combate a um jogador, aquele jogador perde o jogo.

foreignNames.name: Фейдж Неприкасаемая
foreignNames.text:
Когда Фейдж Неприкасаемая входит в игру, если вы разыграли ее не из вашей руки, вы проигрываете партию.
Каждый раз, когда Фейдж наносит боевые повреждения существу, уничтожьте то существо. Оно не может быть регенерировано.
Каждый раз, когда Фейдж наносит боевые повреждения игроку, тот игрок проигрывает партию.

foreignNames.name: 不可近的菲姬
foreignNames.text:
当不可近的菲姬进场时，若你并非从你手上使用之，你输掉这盘游戏。
每当菲姬对任一生物造成战斗伤害时，消灭该生物。 它不能重生。
每当菲姬对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，该牌手输掉这盘游戏。

cards.originalText:
When Phage the Untouchable comes into play, if you didn't play it from your hand, you lose the game.
Whenever Phage deals combat damage to a creature, destroy that creature. It can't be regenerated.
Whenever Phage deals combat damage to a player, that player loses the game.

cards.name: Phantom Warrior
cards.text: Phantom Warrior can't be blocked.
cards.flavor:
"There are as many pillows of illusion as flakes in a snow-storm. We wake from one dream into another dream."
—Ralph Waldo Emerson, "Illusions"

foreignNames.name: Phantomkrieger
foreignNames.text: Der Phantomkrieger ist unblockbar.
foreignNames.flavor: „Illusionen dienen als Ruhekissen, und es gibt so viele wie Flocken in einem Schneesturm. Wir wachen aus einem Traum in den nächsten auf." —Ralph Waldo Emerson, „Illusionen"

foreignNames.name: Guerrero fantasmal
foreignNames.text: El Guerrero fantasmal es imbloqueable.
foreignNames.flavor: "Hay tantas almohadas de ilusión como copos en una tormenta de nieve. Nos despertamos de un sueño a otro sueño." —Ralph Waldo Emerson, "Ilusiones"

foreignNames.name: Guerrier fantomatique
foreignNames.text: Le Guerrier fantomatique est imblocable.
foreignNames.flavor: « La crainte cherche le mal pour s'en affliger avant qu'il ne soit arrivé ; elle ne s'entretient que d'illusions et de fantômes. » —Antoine Gombaud, chevalier de Méré

foreignNames.name: Guerriero Fantasma
foreignNames.text: Il Guerriero Fantasma non può essere bloccato.
foreignNames.flavor: "Ci sono tanti cuscini di illusione quanti sono i fiocchi in una tempesta di neve. Ci svegliamo da un sogno per ritrovarci in un altro." —Ralph Waldo Emerson, "Illusioni"

foreignNames.name: 幻影の戦士
foreignNames.text: 幻影の戦士はブロックされない。
foreignNames.flavor: この世界には吹雪の中の雪片と同じほどの幻影の床がある。 我々は一つの夢から覚めて別の夢に至るのだ。 ――ラルフ・ウォルド・エマーソン「幻想」

foreignNames.name: Guerreiro Fantasma
foreignNames.text: Guerreiro Fantasma não pode ser bloqueado.
foreignNames.flavor: "Existem tantas almofadas de ilusão quanto flocos em uma nevasca. Nós acordamos de um sonho em outro." — Ralph Waldo Emerson, "Ilusões"

foreignNames.name: Призрачный Воин
foreignNames.text: Призрачный Воин не может быть заблокирован.
foreignNames.flavor: "Иллюзий вокруг не меньше, чем хлопьев снега в метель. Просыпаясь, мы переходим из одного сна в другой". — Ральф Вальдо Эмерсон, "Иллюзии"

foreignNames.name: 幽魅战士
foreignNames.text: 幽魅战士不能被阻挡。
foreignNames.flavor: 「幻影梦枕犹如漫天雪花无尽。 我们自梦境醒转，又进入另一个梦境。」 ～拉尔夫·沃尔多·爱默生，《幻影》

cards.originalText: Phantom Warrior is unblockable.

cards.name: Phyrexian Rager
cards.text: When Phyrexian Rager enters the battlefield, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.
cards.flavor: It takes no prisoners, but it keeps the choicest bits for Phyrexia.

foreignNames.name: Phyrexianischer Wüterich
foreignNames.text: Wenn der Phyrexianische Wüterich ins Spiel kommt, ziehst du eine Karte und verlierst 1 Lebenspunkt.
foreignNames.flavor: Er macht keine Gefangenen, aber er hebt die besten Reste für Phyrexia auf.

foreignNames.name: Iracundo pirexiano
foreignNames.text: Cuando el Iracundo pirexiano entre en juego, roba una carta y pierde 1 vida.
foreignNames.flavor: No toma prisioneros, pero conserva los trozos más selectos para Pirexia.

foreignNames.name: Furie phyrexiane
foreignNames.text: Quand la Furie phyrexiane arrive en jeu, vous piochez une carte et vous perdez 1 point de vie.
foreignNames.flavor: Elle ne fait pas de prisonniers mais elle garde les meilleurs morceaux pour Phyrexia.

foreignNames.name: Furia di Phyrexia
foreignNames.text: Quando la Furia di Phyrexia entra in gioco, pesca una carta e perdi 1 punto vita.
foreignNames.flavor: Non prende prigionieri, ma conserva i brandelli migliori per Phyrexia.

foreignNames.name: ファイレクシアの憤怒鬼
foreignNames.text: ファイレクシアの憤怒鬼が場に出たとき、あなたはカードを１枚引き、あなたは１点のライフを失う。
foreignNames.flavor: あいつは情け容赦なく殺しまくるが、使えそうな欠片はファイレクシアのために取っておくんだ。

foreignNames.name: Raivoso Phyrexiano
foreignNames.text: Quando Raivoso Phyrexiano entra em jogo, você compra um card e perde 1 ponto de vida.
foreignNames.flavor: Ele não faz prisioneiros, mas guarda os melhores bocados para Phyrexia.

foreignNames.name: Фирексийское Неистовство
foreignNames.text: Когда Фирексийское Неистовство входит в игру, вы берете карту и теряете 1 жизнь.
foreignNames.flavor: Оно не берет пленных, но приберегает самые лакомые кусочки для Фирексии.

foreignNames.name: 非瑞克西亚狂怒兽
foreignNames.text: 当非瑞克西亚狂怒兽进场时，你抓一张牌，并且失去1点生命。
foreignNames.flavor: 它手下不留活口，但会把最为精粹的部分留给非瑞克西亚。

cards.originalText: When Phyrexian Rager comes into play, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

cards.name: Phyrexian Vault
cards.text: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Draw a card.
cards.flavor:
"The secrets of Phyrexia are expensive. You will pay in brass and bone, steel and sinew."
—Kaervek

foreignNames.name: Phyrexianische Gruft
foreignNames.text: {2}, {T}, opfere eine Kreatur: Ziehe eine Karte.
foreignNames.flavor: „Die Geheimnisse Phyrexias sind nicht einfach zu erlernen. Du wirst in Messing und Knochen, in Stahl und Sehnen bezahlen." —Kaervek

foreignNames.name: Bóveda pirexiana
foreignNames.text: {2}, {T}, sacrificar una criatura: Roba una carta.
foreignNames.flavor: "Los secretos de Pirexia son caros. Pagarás con metal y hueso, fierro y tendón." —Kaervek

foreignNames.name: Arche phyrexiane
foreignNames.text: {2}, {T}, sacrifiez une créature : Piochez une carte.
foreignNames.flavor: « Les secrets de Phyrexia sont coûteux. Vous payerez en bronze et en os, en acier et en tendons. » —Kaervek

foreignNames.name: Cripta di Phyrexia
foreignNames.text: {2}, {T}, Sacrifica una creatura: Pesca una carta.
foreignNames.flavor: "I segreti di Phyrexia sono molto costosi. E si pagano in ottone e ossa, tendini e acciaio." —Kaervek

foreignNames.name: ファイレクシアの蔵
foreignNames.text: {2}, {T}, クリーチャーを1体生け贄に捧げる：カードを１枚引く。
foreignNames.flavor: ファイレクシアの秘密は安くは買えない。 骨と鋼、心臓と真鍮がその代価だ。 ――ケアヴェク

foreignNames.name: Cofre Phyrexiano
foreignNames.text: {2}, {T}, Sacrifique uma criatura: Compre um card.
foreignNames.flavor: "Os segredos de Phyrexia são caros. Você pagará em bronze e ossos, aço e nervos." — Kaervek

foreignNames.name: Фирексийское Хранилище
foreignNames.text: {2}, {T}, Пожертвуйте существо: Возьмите карту.
foreignNames.flavor: "Тайны Фирексии стоят дорого. Ты заплатишь монетой, оружием и собственной шкурой". — Каервек

foreignNames.name: 非瑞克西亚地窖
foreignNames.text: {2}，{T}，牺牲一个生物：抓一张牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 「非瑞克西亚之秘密的代价非常昂贵。 你必须以铜与骨，钢与腱来做代偿。」 ～凯雷威克

cards.originalText: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Draw a card.

cards.name: Pincher Beetles
cards.text: Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
cards.flavor:
"No fair! Since when does a bug get ta munch on me?"
—Squee, goblin cabin hand

foreignNames.name: Kneifkäfer

cards.name: Pithing Needle
cards.text:
As Pithing Needle enters the battlefield, choose a card name.
Activated abilities of sources with the chosen name can't be activated unless they're mana abilities.

rulings.text: Pithing Needle affects cards regardless of what zone they’re in. This includes cards in hand, cards in the graveyard, and exiled cards. For example, a player can’t cycle Eternal Dragon or return an Eternal Dragon from their graveyard to hand if Pithing Needle naming Eternal Dragon is on the battlefield.
You can name any card, even if that card doesn’t normally have an activated ability. You can’t name a token unless that token has the same name as a card.
If you name a card that has both a mana ability and another activated ability, the mana ability can be activated but the other ability can’t be activated.
Once Pithing Needle has left the battlefield, activated abilities of sources with the chosen name can be activated again.
Activated abilities include a colon and are written in the form “[cost]: [effect].” Triggered abilities and static abilities of the named card work normally.

foreignNames.name: Lähmungsnadel

Sowie die Lähmungsnadel ins Spiel kommt, benenne eine Karte.
Aktivierte Fähigkeiten von Quellen mit dem bestimmten Namen können nicht gespielt werden, außer es sind Manafähigkeiten.

foreignNames.name: Aiguille à sectionner

cards.originalText:
As Pithing Needle comes into play, name a card.
Activated abilities of sources with the chosen name can't be played unless they're mana abilities.

cards.name: Plagiarize
cards.text: Until end of turn, if target player would draw a card, instead that player skips that draw and you draw a card.
cards.flavor: "Are you thinking what I'm thinking?"

rulings.text: If you target yourself, this spell has no useful effect. It will not cause an infinite loop since a replacement effect can’t modify the same event more than once. This effect will not modify the draw that it has you perform.
You draw the card from your library as normal, not from your opponent’s library.

If you and your opponent each cast Plagiarize on each other during the same turn, the two spells effectively cancel each other out. You will draw cards when you normally would and so will your opponent.

If you target a player whose library is empty, any effect or turn-based action that would cause that player to draw a card will cause you to draw a card instead. It doesn’t matter that the other player would be unable to draw.

foreignNames.name: Abkupfern

foreignNames.name: Plagiar

foreignNames.name: Plagiare
